p: There is increased awareness of the different ways in which this condition manifests itself and the variety of disabilities that TD produces. Although a substantial research has been stimulated to identify the underlying pathophysiological mechanisms of TD, they remain largely elusive. There are several hypotheses about the pathophysiology of TD (dopamine hypersensitivity, neurotoxicity, GABA insufficiency, noradrenergic dysfunction, structural abnormalities)[ 1], however the true mechanism remains unknown.
